message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO

The paper presents a novel architecture for deep reinforcement learning in first-person shooter games, which involves utilizing visual input as well as game feature information. This falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper involves computer vision techniques (cs.CV) for processing visual input, and graphics (cs.GR) for rendering the game environment. Finally, the paper also involves robotics (cs.RO) as it deals with an autonomous agent navigating and making decisions in a 3D environment.
